meanings.definition: The quality or state of being toxic to the liver.
meanings.sent1: Exposure to hepatotoxicity can damage the liver.
meanings.sent2: Doctors monitor medication for hepatotoxicity to protect the liver.
meanings.sent3: The liver threw a party, but only invited hepatotoxicity!
meanings.sent4: In the body's orchestra, hepatotoxicity plays a discordant note in the liver section.
meanings.sent5: Hepatotoxicity is like a sneaky villain attacking the liver's fortress.

meanings.definition: The degree to which a substance is harmful to the liver.
meanings.sent1: The hepatotoxicity of the chemical was alarming to the researchers.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the hepatotoxicity of different compounds to understand their effects on the liver.
meanings.sent3: The liver complained about the high levels of hepatotoxicity in the diet.
meanings.sent4: The hepatotoxicity of the drug was a dark shadow looming over the patient's recovery.
meanings.sent5: The hepatotoxicity of the poison was a silent threat to the liver's well-being.
